Text: Thanks- also if you are the uploader of ep 11 too.
Thanks  for the efforts  and  pain  to  edit  and upload  these. Looking   forward  for  Episode  11 & 12 :)

Many THANKS! This show's unavailable in the USA.

Heard about the show via Ray Maxwell's podshow on the TWiT network. Ray's a kooky renaissance sorta guy living just south of Vancouver, BC. He mentioned Ice Pilots NWT in episode #59 on a recent midair collision in Colorado. If TPB permits it, here's a link to his show's feed:

http://feeds.feedburner.com/odtv-maxwells-house/?format=xml
